title: Self-adjusting cleaner head on Dyson - Official Dyson Video
description: The self-adjusting cleaner head seals in suction when moving across hardwood floors and carpet.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
The self-adjusting cleaner head seals in suction when moving across hardwood floors and carpet. 

http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson

transcripts: We're both busy people, we both work full time and for me speed is always nice and you can do it without sacrificing on the actual effectiveness of the Dyson vacuum. It's got adjustable clear heads here, so it can transition from carpet to hard floors so you always get maximum suction. I'm able to get home vacuum before she even gets home and then it's just brownie points for me after that. With one hand I can push my Dyson vacuum and go through all different areas of the house it will be part of our family for years to come.
